profile:
At Reliance Holmes Heating & Air Conditioning, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!! 

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.


Reliance Holmes Heating and Air Conditioning is one of the largest and best known HVAC sales and service providers for many reasons, including:

	We've been in business for over 45 years since 
	We're one of the largest HVAC contractors in Ottawa, 
	Many of our products are eligible for an assortment of government and manufacturer rebates 
	We sell and install only the highest standard of heating, cooling and air quality products and services.
	We offer comprehensive repair services and protection plans to keep our customers comfortable year-round.
	Our HVAC technicians are some of the best-trained professionals in the industry.
	We genuinely care about your well-being and will work hard every day to earn your business and trust.

profile:
Enjoy the highest grade in technology, reliability & durability with Water Treatment equipment from Hills & Valley Water Systems. Not only does our equipment offer highest in efficiency standards and reliability, but we offer competitive pricing.

Our staff brings 21 years of experience in solution implementation & design; we are always up to date with current water treatment methodologies and practices in conformance with the highest standards. Hills & Valley Water Systems is a water treatment company experienced in residential, commercial and industrial water solutions. H & V Water Systems is experienced in treating both rural well and municipal water problems.

Hills & Valley Water Systems is a licensed well contractor with the Ministry of Environment and has M.O.E. licensed well technicians on staff. Our proficiency in pump sizing & installation benefits the end users water quality because H & V Water Systems understands the critical requirements of water treatment from the pump & pressure system.

H & V Water Systems is equipped to assist you with all of your water needs. There is no water quality issue we cannot solve.
service_area: Serving Ottawa and all the surrounding regions. East to Hawkesbury, Alexandria, Lancaster. West to Pembroke, Renfrew, Gananoque.
products: Hills & Valley Water Systems specializes in treating all manners of water quality issues. Hardness, Iron, Sulphur, Tannins (tea like colour to the water), Salty taste, Ultraviolet Sterilization for bacteria. H & V is also a Licensed Well Contractor with the Ministry of Environment, with Licensed Well Technicians providing well pump and pressure system installation.
services: Water Treatment Installation & Design, Water Analysis, Pump and Pressure System Installation, Troubleshooting and Repair. Rental Programs.

profile:
Rainsoft turns ordinary water into extraordinary water. 

RainSoft of Ottawa-Eternally Pure Water Systems, Inc was established in 1999. We are a family run business that enjoys helping everyone on city or well water. Our services are from the well pump up and most products carry the exclusive RainSoft Water lifetime warranty. We service and sell in a 150km radius around Ottawa. Some of our best customers come from homeowners who's water is labeled as untreatable until we do a free on site analysis and provide solutions.

The owner Martin Barrett comes from a chemistry background and is very much involved in day to day operations. His past work at MDS labs, water filtration plants and chemical labs provides valuable insight into solving today's problem water.

Our manufacturer, RainSoft, is on the cutting-edge of research and technology, using only state-of-the-art equipment since 1953. Our equipment is made in the USA and sold in over 20 countries throughout the world. RainSoft has been dedicated to producing "The World's Finest Water Treatment" and superior customer satisfaction since day one. RainSoft ensures all air and water conditioning products meet customer expectations and demands.

RainSoft has dedicated research and development, laboratory and manufacturing facilities, and offers rigorous third party testing and certification programs. RainSoft also offers exceptional dealer training and a strong support network. RainSoft proudly offers unsurpassed product warranties with their water softening and air purification products ranging from the small, portable water filtration systems for homes and apartments, to larger treatment systems for factories, hotels and hospitals. RainSoft water treatment systems continually strive to produce the world's finest water for businesses and homes alike.

We have over 50 years of combined experience in the water treatment industry. Eternally Pure Water Systems is fully licensed, bonded and insured.

We offer RainSoft water treatment systems, RainSoft air purification systems, reverse osmosis systems, replacement filters for reverse osmosis, annual maintenance on RainSoft Systems, professional water testing, installation of RainSoft systems, and service of RainSoft systems. Work is completed by factory-trained service technicians and installations are performed by licensed contractors.

With better quality water you can see, taste and feel, the quality difference is clear.

Feel free to visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/RainSoft.HQ

profile:
Eastern Ontario Water Technology Ltd. is a full service franchise of Culligan International Inc. with offices, warehouses and distributor centers in Ottawa, Brockville, Cornwall, Pembroke and in Quebec (Vaudreuil-Dorion). Our company is family owned since 1968, and the third generation is now in charge of the management and operations of the corporation.

We provide equipment and services for residential, commercial and industrial needs. Whether you have rust/iron stains, hard water spots, bad tasting/smelly water, acid stains, we have the solution to your problem.  We offer a FREE in home comprehensive water analysis by our trained Water Technologist with no obligation to all of our customers. Our offices are staffed with experienced and factory trained service technicians responding to the needs to our broad client base. Our large fleet of over 51 vehicles handles our service and distribution requirements.

Our bottling plant in Brockville produces over 750,000 - 18 litre bottles of delicious Culligan Drinking Water per annum. We provide delivery to homes, offices, industrial and retail locations.

In addition we also rent, rent to own, and finance our water treatment equipment at competitive rates. We offer a FREE comprehensive water analysis with no obligation to all of our customers. Salt delivery to all our residential and industrial customers is also available at very competitive prices.

profile:
There are several crucial components to a thorough well inspection. 

Let's explore...

 

The Quality of the water: Water quality is affected by multiple combinations of natural events, including human activities.
 However, other factors such as physical & biological conditions can also contribute to the quality of your water. A potability sample is collected by a certified professional and taken to a private lab for expedited testing. Typically, your detailed report is delivered via email within 24 hours of sample collection.

The Quantity of the water: A proper well & water inspection includes a systematic evaluation of the well yield by conducting a pump flow test.  This is a measurement test of the water flow, and refresh rate - indicating the adequacy of the water supply from the well into the water infrastructure. This is a very important process – as this test can determine if the well provides sufficient water supply for your family’s needs. 


A Well Done Inspection :  includes detailed testing and reporting on the findings regarding the condition of the water in the residence. In many cases, the home will have existing water treatment equipment. We will determine if the existing equipment is functioning properly and give you peace of mind that the water you are drinking is safe for consumption. Moreover, the water is not harming your appliances, clothes, and fixtures. (Water with high levels of iron for example, can damage your tubs, showers, sinks, and toilets - as well as your water fed appliances, and even permanently stain your laundry.)


Well Done Ottawa is a company that prides itself on reliable knowledge, quality products, and customer satisfaction.

 Homeowners with a private well need to keep hazardous chemicals, such as pesticides, fertilizer, paint, and motor oil far away from the well, and maintain a clean area between the well and any kennels or livestock operations.

 We care about our clients, with a clear and important aim: providing an essential service that will add value to your home, health, and life.
name: Well Done Ottawa

Quality always pays.
